outputs.output_descr: 1. Adaptive management framework for conservation is established and operational; 2. Conservation functions are fully operationalized; 3. A community-based framework is tested & effective; 4. Broadbased awareness and conservation values and management needs is imparted to forest edge & other Samareño stakeholders; 5. Conservation internalized in sectoral development, planning, budgeting & activity delivered; 6. Barriers to wild resources are removed through demonstration activities; 7. Mechanisms to finance the recurrent activities are in place.
